skills.name: Install esbuild
skills.pattern: npm install esbuild --save-dev

skills.name: CLI Build
skills.pattern:
npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js
npx esbuild src/*.ts --bundle --minify --outdir=dist

skills.name: Build API
Transform
Bundle Options
Output Format
Loaders
External
skills.pattern:
external: ['react', 'react-dom'],
packages: 'external'  // All node_modules

skills.name: Define
Aliases
Platform
skills.pattern:
platform: 'browser',  // Browser
// platform: 'node',  // Node.js

skills.name: Target
skills.pattern: target: ['es2020', 'chrome80', 'firefox78']

skills.name: Watch Mode
Dev Server
Plugin
CSS Bundle
Code Splitting
Metafile
skills.pattern:
const result = await esbuild.build({ metafile: true });
console.log(await esbuild.analyzeMetafile(result.metafile));

skills.name: Source Maps
Tree Shaking
skills.pattern:
treeShaking: true,
bundle: true,
minify: true

skills.name: JSX Config
skills.pattern:
jsx: 'automatic',  // React 17+
jsxDev: true,
jsxFactory: 'h',
jsxFragment: 'Fragment'

skills.name: Inject
skills.pattern: inject: ['./process-shim.js']

skills.name: Banner/Footer
Legal Comments
Public Path
skills.pattern:
publicPath: 'https://cdn.example.com/',
loader: { '.png': 'file' }

skills.name: Stdin Input
Write Control
Incremental
Drop Code
skills.pattern: drop: ['console', 'debugger']

skills.name: Performance
